cos.name: kuquar
cos.title: Ku-Quar
cos.description: Ku-Quar wandered through Death House with everyone and after several tough battles he took an opportunity to take his own life in order to save everyone else.
famous: Struggled to hit a Mimic door
Killed himself and turned into a Revenant
Arty tried to stop him from dying, which caused Ku-Quar to seek revenge against him

cos.name: arty
cos.title: Artefact #4546B a.k.a Arty
cos.description: Arty was destroyed whilst humans tried to summon Talos into a suit of armour and Talos was in such a rage that he destroyed the church and grounds. Centuries later Gorek and other Spellworkers uncovered Arty and restored him. Now he still has the power of Talos but has no human emotion or sympathy, he understands the world by copying others.
famous: Summons a Spirit Hammer similar to his Warhammer
Burned down gallows to cheer Dwight up
Chased down Strahd to rescue charmed Godfrey
Killed by Griek, twice
Turned into a Tyrannosaurus and ate a werewolf

cos.name: godfrey
cos.title: Godfrey the Vengeful
cos.description: Godfrey is a descendant from royalty. His homeland was ravaged by an inexplicable plague and he set off to learn the ways of the Paladin under the guidance of Helm. He vowed never to return home until could find a way to remove the plague.
famous: Ireena hid behind his shield
Strahd charmed him and took him away
Helm saved him from Strahd, and in the process infused a magical power within him
He has changed his oath, to strike vengeance against Strahd

cos.name: ka
cos.title: Ka Ka Tikki Tikki Ka Ka
cos.description: Entered Barovia contracted to retrieve a powerful item, he got stuck in Barovia and has since taken contracts in order to kill werewolves and vampires.
famous: Started a race with Dwight to break the monotony
Used his mask to pretend to be Dwight and the werewolf Lykaios
Managed to steal the Holy Symbol before Dwight, but gave it back

cos.name: dwight
cos.title: Dwight Ribble
cos.description: Dwight went through hell as a young elf, his entire family was killed and he saw his own mother burned to death in-front of his own eyes. He pursued and killed those responsible. He spent most of his life surviving in caves and abandoned castles until he was recruited by the Wraith Raiders.
famous: Extremely sneaky
Extremely dangerous with a bow
Plays pranks on Gorek
No one has caught him with his pickpocket abilities
Cursed after stealing some treasure from the werewolves
Lost against Ka and owes him one favour

cos.name: gorek
cos.title: Gorek Gottrisson
cos.description: Gorek was young when he started tinkering with items, and he did so in a way that his family didn't approve and they exiled him. After that, he joined the Spellworkers and met Arty who he took an interest in and wanted to learn how he works. Time has made Gorek into a grumpy old dwarf and he will a pick fight with anyone who doesn't agree with him.
famous: Uses thunder gauntlets
Loves rocks, a little too much
Plays pranks on Dwight
Uses his flute to cast spells
Created replicas of everyone to fool the werewolves
Cursed after stealing some treasure from the werewolves

cos.name: zordar
cos.title: Zordar
cos.description: A strong warrior and enjoys nothing more than swinging his giant greataxe around. If he can smell liquor he will decend on it faster than you can say 'Zordar the Dragonborn'.
famous: Always the first one to get within 5ft of a monster
Has had the most alcohol out of all the characters
Almost died because of some weak bats
Was captured by werewolves, no one tried to save him

cos.name: xerus
cos.title: Xerus
cos.description: Spent his entire life trapped in Barovia performing tricks for the locals, whilst adventuring he entered Death House and became so afraid that he decided to hide inside the ring his patron, Efreeti, gave him. Only after his new companions found him did he come out and now has a blood thurst for revenge against Strahd.
famous: Causes mischief using his surrounding environment
Uses lots of fire
Has an overly friendly Efreeti patron
Will always remind you that he killed a dragon and a hag (with ease)
Caused a riot in Vallaki and became the hero of Vallaki
Turned into a werewolf after being bit by the Loup Garu

cos.name: rictavio
cos.title: Van Richten a.k.a Rictavio
cos.description: Van Richten is a vampire hunter who has been hunting Strahd for a long time. He found himself trapped in Barovia and has not been able to escape. He now goes by the name Rictavio and tries to keep the large city of Vallaki safe from Strahd and his dark intentions.
famous: Has a pet sabertooth in his storage space
Speaks wildly when pretending to be Rictavio
Has a lot of stories that he shares with people, they seem made up
Has a cane which conceals a sword
Saw Zordar being taken by the werewolves and chased them down to help save him
Is the point of contact for the Luminaries
Offers a service to record stories, he will pay for them
Does not want anyone to know his identity.

cos.name: shield-guardian
cos.title: Shield Guardian of the Armlet
cos.description: On one of Xerus's adventures he came across an Armlet which lets him call forth a Shield Guardian. He made an agreement with Efreeti to keep it inside his ring which keeps the genie company.
famous: Really big, can't fit through an average door.

cos.name: efreeti
cos.title: Efreeti
cos.description: Xerus's patron. He lives inside his ring and has asked Xerus to do many dangerous things in the past. He is an evil being, but has his own moral compass that guides him in life.
famous: Invited everyone into Xerus's ring to have a look around.
Gave Xerus an extra pact slot in exchange for destroying Vallaki Town Square.

cos.name: python-staff
cos.title: Python Staff
cos.description: Xerus found the Staff of the Python whilst clearing out a cave of vampires. He can now summon a large snake by throwing the staff to the ground
famous: Was used quite a bit in order to travel around the marsh.

cos.name: kasimir
cos.title: Kasimir Velikov
cos.description: Kasimir used to live with the Vistani who camped outside of Vallaki and helped lead them. After his daughter drowned in lake Zarovich he decided to leave the group and save his sister Patrina Velikovna from Strahd.
famous: Staying in Krezk in order to liase with Ezmerelda
Wears a ring which keeps him warm.
He has asked to go with the group to the Amber Temple to find a cure for vampirism.
Has said that the Amber Temple is too cold to withstand without warm winter gear.
He is leaving in a day with or without the group.

cos.name: emil
cos.title: Emil
famous: Is Zuleika's partner.
Locked by Strahd as he tried to convince the Werewolves to stop their ways.
Strahd has said his body is locked in his dungeon.

cos.name: rahadin
cos.title: Rahadin
famous: Showed everyone to the dining hall in Caslte Ravenloft.

cos.name: strahd
cos.title: Strahd von Zarovich
cos.description: Strahd's magic is powerful and has decended Barovia into chaos. He is a driven by the woman he loved, Tatyana and plans to make Ireena his bride as he believes she is her reincarnation.
famous: Met everyone in Barovia outside of the church and gave them in an invite for dinner.
Mordenkainen took several people to attack the castle (including Doru) and failed, he threw her off a cliff and presumed she had died.
Possessed Ireena and others in order to get them to come over for dinner.
Tatyana was his brother's (Serei) wife.
During Sergei and Tatyana's wedding he killed them both.
He invaded the land and named it Barovia.
During the invasion the Gottrison's locked up their mine form him.
He found the group and took Godfrey away with him.
He summoned several bats and nearly killed everyone.
When he realised the Godfrey was not Sergei he let Griek experiment on him.
He was quiet whilst trying to work out how to get into the mines after seeing the group enter.
He managed to work out how to get into the mine (you don't know how).
Controlled Mordenkainen and made her activate the mines defences to attack the group.
They fought him and killed him in the mines.
Before he died he said if he did get Ireena he would destroy everyone in Barovia and send vampires out into the world.

cos.name: ireena
cos.title: Ireena
cos.description: As a child she was found walking in the woods alone by Izmark. As she grew Strahd showed an interest in her, believing she is Tatyana's riencarnation.
famous: When they met they saw she had several marks on her neck, beleiving they are Strahd's bite marks.
She left Barovia village with the group to seek refuge in Vallaki.
She was possessed by Strahd and forced everyone to dine with him.
For some reason she has taken a liking to Godfrey and gave him a magical shield and a silver sword.
The baroness of Vallaki gave her a job as ger hand maid. It was torturous.
After the saking of Vallaki the group decided to keep her safe in the mine.
She took Scoob, the Baron's matif, to keep her company in the mine.
The group came to lift the curse on her which binds her to Strahd but found her on her knees chanting.

cos.name: mordenkainen
cos.title: Mordenkainen
cos.description: Mmordenkainen is a powerful mage and took a group of villagers to sake Castle Ravenloft, but failed. She hid from Strahd and learned how to enter the mines, as she entered the mines werewolves attacked her. The spell she cast was so powerful that her memory was  fragmented and the entrance to the mine was destroyed and unusable. She has agreed to take one sixth of the income from the trade route in return she will look after Ireena and the mines.
famous: When the group met her they struggled to follow her logic.
She learnt Primordial and got access to the mines.
They used the Greater Restoration spell to bring her memory back.
She summoned a mansion for herself in the mines.
She summoned a mansion for Ireena in the mines.
Strahd has commanded her to trigger the mines defences to attack the group.
Strahd then slit her throat and drank her blood, she is currently incapacited on the floor.

cos.name: cipher
cos.title: Cipher
cos.description: Created by the Gottrison's as a way to get back into the mines and lock everyone else out. It is impossible to get in and out of the mines without this. It has it's own conciousness.
famous: Tampered with by Mordenkainen.
Arrogant and tells everyone their are stupid.
Once a day can cast Greater Restoration.
Only Zordar can understand it as it speaks Primordial.

cos.name: scoob
cos.title: Scoob
cos.description: One of the surviving Mastif's of the former Baron of Vallaki.
famous: Kept Ireena company.
Found dead in the mines.

cm.name: timagast
cm.title: Timagast
cm.description: He is short, quick-tempered and very hairy. Timagast spent a lot of time studying mushrooms and their effect on people.
famous: Has bugs in his hair.
Turned a pile of a book into his 'Book Club'.
Owns a mastiff named Ambrosius as a mount and a frog named Frog.

cm.name: cloud
cm.title: Cloud
cm.description: Cloud spent a lot of time walking the world and creating a compendium of all the animals he saw along the way.
famous: Knows a lot about animals, including the every-frog.
Has a black pet cat which sits on his shoulder, named Barret.
Has a Chocobo named Highwind.
Turned a magical bookcase into a magical flail.
Got the Charm of Feather Falling from a ghost in Chalet Brantifax.

cm.name: florian
cm.title: Florian
cm.description: Is a borderline con artist who's book '10 ways to cure warts' had an entry which, much to his surprise, worked.
famous: Is cautious of chairs, and when offered to sit down, he would prefer to stand.
A raven dropped a book in front of his feet.
Has a horse, dressed as a unicorn, known as Charlie the Unicorn.

cm.name: firewatch
cm.title: Firewatch
cm.description: Used to work in Candlekeep as a fire warden. He became obsolete after the fire were magically controlled throughout Candlekeep and was allowed to travel the world as an Avowed.
famous: Has a compartment in his chest for a fire extinguisher and scissor lift left to reach up to 8ft tall.
Hates fire and will put it out if he can.

cm.name: cassandra
cm.title: Cassandra of Quirm
cm.description: An orphan whose parents died before she was born, she travelled around and ended up in Candlekeep after writing an erotic self help book.
famous: Loves erotic smooth jazz.
Owns a horse named Honey Bun.
Got the Charm of Heroism from a ghost in Chalet Brantifax.

cm.name: pittacus
cm.title: Pittacus
cm.description: One of the Great Readers in Candlekeep
famous: Indoctrinates all new Seekers.
Responsible for the usage of The Pillars of Pedagogy.
Primary expertise: the preservation of rare and endangered races.

cm.name: janussi
cm.title: Janussi
cm.description: As the Keeper of Tomes she is the highest ranking member of the Avowed and govenor of Candlekeep.
famous: Selects scholars to fill vacant seats.
Her word is law.
Devoted follower of Deneir.

cm.name: bookwyrm
cm.title: Bookwyrm
cm.description: The First Reader is responsible for aquiring unique tomes and scrolls to go into Candlekeep deep archive.
famous: Once someone becomes an Avowed she will pay a fair price for any material which she deems good.
She is often found in The Hearth, there to convince people to write content for the archive.
If asked, she would encourage people to follow mysteries presented to them and not hide anything.

cm.name: matreous
cm.title: Matreous
cm.description: Matreous came up with the idea to expand all the buildings with Magical Mansions and created the spell on The House of Rest such that everytime you get to the top floor a new floor appears.
famous: When studying Magical Mansions he was stuck in Fistandia's mansion.
After escaping he was killed by an unknown assailant.
In his hand he had a note "Freyot can no longer be trusted".
By all accounts he is seen as a good person and no one is currently aware about his connection to Freyot.
The group are still awaiting a response from his family about the lead up to his death.

cm.name: gre
cm.title: Gre
cm.description: Gre, a former necromancer from Shadowfell, now rears a red dragon under a volcano near Chalet Brantifax.
famous: Escaped Shadowfell after getting a dragon egg.
Killed nine dwarves to make an alter and hide his book.
Cares for Drugry and is helping him create a dragon hoard.
Has asked the group to go to Chalet Brantifax and cross into Shadowfell to finish what he started.
He plans to take Drugry to Candlekeep and start a hoard similar to Miiyrm

cm.name: drugry
cm.title: Drugry
cm.description: Drugry is only new into this world but has already started his own hoard.
famous: He aspires to be like Miirym who he read about in a book.
Sleeps in a pool of lava with a small hoard.
Is willing to share some of his hoard so long as Gre is satisfied.

cm.name: freyot
cm.title: Freyot
cm.description: A mysterious figure mentioned in Candlekeep who helps guide people to break the rules.
famous: There is no trace of Freyot, there would be if they were an official memeber or guest.
Convinced Fistandia to steal books and hide them in a magical mansion.
Blackmailed Fistandia and concoctued necromantic experiments in the cellar of the mansion.
Matreous had a note saying "Freyot can no longer be trusted".
Convinced Lirial to take parts of books out, she was exiled from Candlekeep after she took more than half a book and triggered the theft spell.
Convinced Francis to transcribe books using the Message spell to people outside of Candlekeep. He lost his voice and now works as a maintanence manager.
Little One worked out with everyone that Freyot must be able to change their appearence with everyone.
Little One also concluded that Freyot does seem to commit crimes or force anyone to break the rules, but instead coreces those who are vulnerable.

cm.name: fistandia
cm.title: Fistandia
cm.description: A relativly new member, he only recently dissapeared and no one knows where he is but Janussi is looking for him.
famous: Created a magical mansion in The Pillars of Pedagogy.
Freyot convinced him to steal books and hide them in the mansion.
Created a homunculus that lives, so Fistandia must still be alive.

cm.name: francis
cm.title: Francis
cm.description: Works in Candlekeep on various maintenance jobs.
famous: Freyot convinced him to use the Message spell and transcribe books to someone outside of Candlekeep.
After a while he lost his ability to speak properly.
He is currently struggling to fix the elevator in The House of Rest.

cm.name: lirial
cm.title: Lirial
cm.description: Exiled from Candlekeep for stealing from the archive.
famous: Freyot tought her that she could steal parts of books which got around the spell to stop books from being stolen.
Later it was revealed that once more than half the book had been removed from the archive the spell is triggered and the book is returned.
After being caught Janussi exiled her for stealing from the archive.

cm.name: little-one
cm.title: Little One
cm.description: Little One was an Ogre who killed a halfling from Candlekeep then stole his band of intelligence, now he resides in Candlekeep and enjoys talking to everyone in The Hearth. If you want to know something about someone, he's your Ogre.
famous: Incredibly intelligent thanks to his intelligence band.
Knows everyone and everything that goes on in Candlekeep.
Won't leave, knowing that people will try to kill him for being an Ogre.
Knows a few stories about Freyot but believes that there is no one named Freyot in Candlekeep.

cm.name: vermillion-ghost
cm.title: Vermillion Dwarf Ghosts
cm.description: After their home was destroyed these dwarves left Vemillion and found themselves at the top of the Hand and Horn, dead.
famous: Left an update to a book in Candlekeep known as "A Deep and Creeping Darkness".
Their Platinum mine. was destoryed so they left.
Gre killed them and used their skulls to lock his necromancer books away.

cm.name: khe-ril hammerbind
cm.title: Khe'ril Hammerbind
cm.description: Hammerbind works at the Smithy and Stables and knows many things about weapons, armour and shields as well as mounts of all kinds.
famous: Works at the Smithy and Stables.
You can buy, sell, repair and upgrade weapons, armour and shields from him.
He also sells, rents and cares for mounts and pets.99

cm.name: feldmar-bisset-iii
cm.title: Feldmar Bisset III
cm.description: The owner of the Erudite Outfitters & Clothiers and the priest of the Temple of Oghma.
famous: The owner of the Erudite Outfitters & Clothiers, its inventory changes regularly and she will buy and sell magical items such as cloaks or rings.
She is also the priest at the Temple of Oghma, where you can get religious respite.

cm.name: barnaby-trouthole
cm.title: Barnaby Trouthole
cm.description: You will find Barnaby at The House of the Binder, where you can buy and sell scrolls or wizard book as well as pay to have copies of books made to take out of Candlekeep.
famous: Works at the House of The Binder.
When Firewatch became obsolete he worked for Barnaby and copied many texts.

cm.name: a-lai-aivenmore
cm.title: A'lai Aivenmore
cm.description: Former priest of the Temple of Ogma and now a Great Reader who specialises in divinity.
famous: Primary expertise: divinity (the gods and the nature of the divine).
Former priest of the Temple of Ogma
A worshiper of Oghma (god of knowledge)

cm.name: alkrist
cm.title: Alkrist
cm.description: Most of their study is based on politics and military strategy.
famous: Primary expertise politics, military strategy, and significant battles of Toril.

cm.name: daral-yashenti
cm.title: Daral yashenti
cm.description: Largely focused on collecting and curating music, poetry, and literature.
famous: Primary expertise: music, poetry, and literature.

cm.name: fheminor-scrivenbark
cm.title: Fheminor Scrivenbark
cm.description: Fheminor knows everything about history, folklore, and cultures.
famous: Primary expertise: history, folklore, and the cultures of Toril (past and present).
Explained to the group about Shadowfell and the Vistani

cm.name: kazryn-nyantani
cm.title: Kazryn Nyantani
cm.description: A powerful cleric who specialises in the natural world and celestial navigation.
famous: Primary expertise: the natural world and celestial navigation.

cm.name: sylvira-savikas
cm.title: Sylvira Savikas
cm.description: Sylvira knows a great deal about the Great Wheel of planes.
famous: Primary expertise: the Great Wheel of the planes.

cm.name: teles-ahvoste
cm.title: Teles Ahvoste
cm.description: Teles specialises in magic items, curses and the Weave.
famous: Primary expertise: magic items, curses, and the Weave.

cm.name: v-ziir-ag
cm.title: V'ziir-Ag
cm.description: Ag has a dark sense of humour and loves all things unnatural
famous: Primary expertise: all things unnatural (including aberrations, undead, and the Far Realm).
